summary: This bill, the Veteran Wildland Firefighter Employment Act of 2025, directs the Secretary of Veterans Affairs to establish a pilot program in coordination with the Secretaries of Agriculture and Interior. This program will employ veterans in federal wildland firefighting activities, including identifying vacant positions and employing veterans in those positions.  The bill mandates reports on the pilot program's implementation and effectiveness, defines 'wildland firefighting activities,' and sets a termination date for the program.
